alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 7:57AM EDT until March 23 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... West central Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 656 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Panama City Beach to near Tyndall Air Force Base, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Ebro, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Holmes Valley, Bennett, Porter Lake, Brannonville, Millville and West Bay. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
